libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: dialogElementUid
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Counter used to generate unique IDs for dialog elements.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/accordi.name: SDS_ACCORDION
libs/packages/components/src/lib/accordi.description: Token used to provide a SdsAccordion to SdsAccordionItem. Used primarily to avoid circular imports between SdsAccordion and SdsAccordionItem.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: SDS_DIALOG_DATA
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Injection token that can be used to access the data that was passed in to a dialog.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: SDS_DIALOG_DEFAULT_OPTIONS
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Injection token that can be used to specify default dialog options.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: SDS_DIALOG_SCROLL_STRATEGY
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Injection token that determines the scroll handling while the dialog is open.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/menu/me.name: SDS_MENU_TOKEN
libs/packages/components/src/lib/menu/me.description: Injection token used to provide the parent menu to menu items.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/selecte.name: SDS_SelectedResult_VALUE_ACCESSOR

libs/packages/components/src/lib/truncat.name: SDS_TRUNCATED_TEXT_DATA
libs/packages/components/src/lib/truncat.description: Used primarily to avoid circular imports between SdsAccordion and SdsAccordionItem.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/menu/me.name: sdsMenuAnimations

libs/packages/components/src/lib/toolbar.name: sdsToolbarAnimations
TOOLBAR_ANIMATION_TIMING
libs/packages/components/src/lib/toolbar.description: Time and timing curve for accordion item animations.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/truncat.name: sdsTruncateTextAnimations

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: _applyConfigDefaults
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Applies default options to the dialog config.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: createFakeEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Creates a fake event object with any desired event type.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: createKeyboardEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Dispatches a keydown event from an element.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: createTouchEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Creates a browser TouchEvent with the specified pointer coordinates.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: dispatchEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Utility to dispatch any event on a Node.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: dispatchFakeEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Shorthand to dispatch a fake event on a specified node.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: dispatchKeyboardEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Shorthand to dispatch a keyboard event with a specified key code.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: dispatchMouseEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Shorthand to dispatch a mouse event on the specified coordinates.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: dispatchTouchEvent
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Shorthand to dispatch a touch event on the specified coordinates.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: getClosestDialog
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Finds the closest SdsDialogRef to an element by looking at the DOM.

jsdoctags.comment: Element relative to which to look for a dialog.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.name: patchElementFocus
libs/packages/components/src/lib/testing.description: Patches an elements focus and blur methods to emit events consistently and predictably. This is necessary, because some browsers, like IE11, will call the focus handlers asynchronously, while others won't fire them at all if the browser window is not focused.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: throwSdsDialogContentAlreadyAttachedError
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Throws an exception for the case when a ComponentPortal is attached to a DomPortalOutlet without an origin.

libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.name: DialogRole
libs/packages/components/src/lib/dialog/.description: Valid ARIA roles for a dialog element.
